price: (Ànábì) Mūsā sọ pé: “Fir‘aon, dájúdájú èmi ni Òjíṣẹ́ kan láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa gbogbo ẹ̀dá.
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā yāfir'ʿawnu innī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
